overview:
Ernie Bray is San Diego-based Entrepreneur, CEO, Author and business coach.

Bray is currently the CEO of AutoClaims Direct, a provider of claims software and services to the Property and Casualty claims industry and the founder of Rocket241.com, a business consulting site.

  • Bray has led AutoClaims Direct to a 4th consecutive year on Inc. Magazine’s list of fastest growing companies in America, 3rd straight year on Deloitte’s Technology Fast-500, a 2012 Red Herring 100 Americas winner, and 3 years on the Lead411 Tech 200.

  • Led recent expansion of the corporation which resulted to a growth rate of 261% in the past four years during a nationwide economic recession.

  • Helped company introduce seven new successful software products including rules based compliance, metric based dispatching, virtual office solution and a complete claims adjusting system.

  • Bray is a Six Sigma Black Belt and has been key in forging AutoClaims Direct into a “lean” organization with a highly effective and technologically advanced team.

  • Consulted to create claims processes for multiple insurers which resulted in a leakage reduction of over 6.5% and annual savings in loss expenditures in the millions.

  • Bray was named Executive of the Year, in Insurance at the 2012 Stevie Awards.

*Bray was named Finalist for the 2010, 2011 Executive of the Year, at The American Business Awards

  • Bray honored as Finalist for the San Diego Business Journal’s 2010 and 2011 Most Admired CEO of the Year.
  • Bray was named Finalist for the 2010 Businessperson of the Year, Carlsbad Chamber Annual Business Awards

Bray is the author of the best selling book, Crash Course 101 and is releasing his new book, 99.9 Tips for Explosive Business Growth in late 2012.
